name: Voltventure
description:
STORY

To make our customers and our workers life easier and because we love to be efficient and accurate at the same time.

With our skill in quantum technology and our perseverance, we have revolutionized our profession

We are Quantum Volt and we invented the brand new atomic electrician squad, capable to solve any wiring issue in a record time

PLOT

In Voltventure play as an electrician squad member and try to solve any wiring issue in a record time, you are timed !

GAMPLAY

Be aware, jumping through a control panel can be dangerous, you might encounter hazards between defective wires, don't rush to death too quickly by grabbing the wrong one or being electrified !
